text: AN experiment in courtesy is launched by the Electricity Board The board is laying a cable along a seven-mile route in Surrey. A warden, Mr. Jack Finlay, has been appointed to smooth out diffculties for householders when trenches are outside their front gates. Splendid. By showing concern for the the board will earn their will. Happy patrolling, Mr. Finlay!
